SELECT FROM_UNIXTIME(left(card.activeDate,10),"%Y-%m-%d") as date, count(*) as number, sum(errorStatus) as status FROM zgk_user_account account LEFT JOIN zgk_card card ON card.userId = account.id WHERE 1=1
AND card.goodsNumber like CONCAT(#{areaCode},'%')
AND card.activeDate > #{startDate} AND card.activeDate < #{endDate} group by FROM_UNIXTIME(left(card.activeDate,10),"%Y-%m-%d")
